name: Chirper - Newsfeed Simulator
description:
Hot Takes ONLY!

Try to keep calm while reading hot takes from your favorite social media app Chirper.  You might need to hold on to your keyboard! 

For a better experience download the PC or Mac version.

How To Play

On your keyboard press and hold the keys displayed on screen to destroy them and keep calm.

Credits
  • Luis Bazán - Code, Art, Game Design
  • Jorge Luis De Alba - Game Design, Code
  • Bernardo Paz - Writing
  • Rob Sánchez  - Character Artist

Music theme by Purple Planet music at https://www.purple-planet.com

Made for the 2020 GMTK Jam. The theme was Out of Control.
